subject: Testing Object Interactions
msgSnippet: Let s say I do an Account to Account transfer and this information is stored in object. How do I write a testcase to test the validity of this sequence ? Also
messageBody:
Let's say I do an Account to Account transfer and this information is
stored in object. How do I write a testcase to test the validity of
this sequence ?

Also can I test for non-primitive data types like BYTE Array ?

Thanks
Anand
